name: New Service Uses Double Ampersand in Path
description: Detects a service installation that uses a suspicious double ampersand used in the image path value
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*\&&*)`
